page.title: 03CHURCHES AND BENEFICE
page.content: Combined parish of Toot & Marsh Baldon with Nuneham Courtenay has 650 folk & 4 church buildings,2 not in regular se. Restoration costing Â£70000 being carried out on St.Lawrence's (Toot) and St.Peter's (Marsh). ince 1981 the parish has been part of Dorchester Team Ministry(ten parishes) 5 priests look after the worship, teaching,pastoral care and school inistry in their own areas. The parishes combine for worship each fifth Sunday,exchange preachers, hold a joint Confirmation and Lenten observances, and joint conferences and retreats. Tony Moore, vicar of Baldons and N.C. has additional duties as Archdeaconry Ecumenical Officer,which take him out of the parish for meetings and visits to church groups in the diocesan area.
